plot: A boy from the country arrives in Seoul to look for his former girlfriend and accepts a job working in the same bar as she does in order to keep an eye on her.
title: 0 beon agashi
plot_es: A boy from the country arrives in Seoul to look for his former girlfriend and accepts a job working in the same bar as she does in order to keep an eye on her.
plot_en: A boy from the country arrives in Seoul to look for his former girlfriend and accepts a job working in the same bar as she does in order to keep an eye on her.
